title: Bitcoin’s Rally Cools as Traders Hedge the Heat
contentSnippet: After months of steady gains, BTC is slipping below key cost-basis levels as long-term holders sell into strength and traders retreat to defensive derivatives.

title: US energy sec floats faster grid access for AI and crypto miners
contentSnippet: S. Matthew Schultz, the CEO of Bitcoin mining company CleanSpark, said the new rules would create expedited connections for Bitcoin mining and data centers.

title: Swiss Bank Sygnum to Launch Bitcoin-Backed Loan Platform With Multi-Sig Wallet Control
contentSnippet: The offering, developed with non-custodial BTC lending startup Debifi, targets institutions and high-net worth borrowers who don't want to give up control of their assets.

title: Another ‘Satoshi era’ wallet from 2009 has woken up to move Bitcoin
contentSnippet: The Satoshi-era Bitcoin whale was last active in June 2011, but initially mined its coins between April and June 2009, soon after the network went live.

title: Australians punch above their weight in crypto interest, data shows
contentSnippet: The Australian crypto user base is expected to grow to 11.16 million by next year, with nearly 41% of Australians participating in crypto.

title: Bitcoin not immune to 50% crashes despite Wall Street love: BitMine’s Lee
contentSnippet: Tom Lee points to the stock market’s steep drawdowns, despite strong progress in recent times, as a sign that Bitcoin could still see 50% declines in the future.

title: Solo Bitcoin miner scores $347K — ‘pure self-soverignty in action’
contentSnippet: A solo Bitcoin miner has solved block 920,440, mining it entirely on their own and cashing in a huge reward for themselves.

title: How Much Could Bitcoin, Ether, XRP and Solana Move After the U.S. Inflation Report?
contentSnippet: The release of September's Consumer Price Index (CPI) is expected to show a 3.1% rise in the cost of living from a year earlier, the highest in 18 months, according to FactSet.

title: Rep. Maxine Waters Blasts Trump Pardon of Binance Founder
contentSnippet: Trump’s pardon of Binance founder Changpeng Zhao has ignited political outrage and renewed scrutiny of his ties to the crypto industry.

title: DOGE Breaks $0.195 Level on Heavy Trade, Wyckoff Setup Points to Next Leg Higher
contentSnippet: Analysts see similarities to past Wyckoff accumulation phases, suggesting potential for further price increases if support holds above $0.194.

title: Hopes rise for altseason, but the signals aren’t there yet
contentSnippet: Crypto analysts said the altcoin season could be arriving soon as liquidity shifts to risk assets, but altseason indicators currently stand at bear market lows.

title: XRP Flashes Bullish Signal as Exchange Balances Drop 3%
contentSnippet: Onchain data show a 3.36% drop in exchange reserves since early October — a historically bullish signal tied to long-term whale accumulation.

title: イーサリアム『フサカ』12月3日実装へ、次期『グラムステルダム』準備も
contentSnippet: イーサリアム開発者は第223回ACDE会議で、フサカアップグレードの12月3日実装と、次期グラムステルダムの提案締切（10月30日）を決定。BAL技術導入やEIP 8058の追加など、スケーラビリティ強化に向けた計画が明らかに。

title: Bitcoin's Large Bag Holders Remain Net Buyers as Leverage Unwinds
contentSnippet: Some see possibility for a renewed bullish setup for Bitcoin as key holders continue accumulating following the market's historic wipeout.

title: Polymarket bets that Sam Bankman-Fried gets pardon surge to 12%
contentSnippet: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried’s odds on Polymarket of being pardoned by US President Donald Trump have more than doubled since Changpeng Zhao was pardoned.

title: 中東・北アフリカの仮想通貨市場が成長　トルコでアルトコイン投機が活発化＝チェイナリシス
contentSnippet: チェイナリシスが2025年時点での中東・北アフリカ地域の仮想通貨市場を分析した。トルコ、イスラエル、イラン、UAEでの成長をそれぞれ解説している。

title: Bulls dominate as Bitcoin options open interest soars to $63B
contentSnippet: Bitcoin options open interest reached a record $63 billion, with bullish strike prices at $120,000 to $140,000 dominating.

title: Trader who made $190M shorting crash also apparently bet on CZ’s pardon
contentSnippet: While some onchain sleuths called it “obvious insider knowledge,” others argued that Trump’s pardon of Changpeng Zhao was expected.

title: ビットコイン11万ドル台を回復、トランプ大統領のCZ恩赦でBNBとWLFIが上昇
contentSnippet: 暗号資産（仮想通貨）ビットコインは11万ドル台で軟調推移。オプション建玉増加やETF流出が重荷も、需給整理進み反発期待の声。トランプ大統領によるバイナンス創設者CZ恩赦を受け、BNBは5%高、WLFIは15%急騰した。

title: カルシとレッドストーン提携　予測市場データを110超のチェーンで展開
contentSnippet: DeFiレッドストーンとカルシが提携し、CFTC規制下の予測市場データを110以上のブロックチェーンで提供開始。オラクル技術により実世界イベントデータのオンチェーン化を実現、DeFi開発者に新たな構築基盤を提供。

title: Woman Repeatedly Warned by Canadian Exchange Not to Transfer Crypto, Gets Scammed Anyway
contentSnippet: Despite repeated warnings from crypto exchange NDAX Canada, the customer lost her life savings in Ethereum to a scam.

title: Crypto traders brace for Friday’s delayed US inflation report
contentSnippet: September’s inflation data, which has been delayed by the government shutdown, is expected to be high at 3.1% but it is unlikely to stop momentum for Fed rate cuts.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: After CZ’s Pardon, Odds Rise for Sam Bankman-Fried’s Second Chance
contentSnippet: It's still a long shot that FTX's Sam Bankman-Fried will be pardoned, but odds have spiked as Binance's Changpeng Zhao has its criminal record deleted.

title: 資産運用大手ティー・ロウ・プライスが仮想通貨ETF市場に参入へ　BTCなど複数銘柄へ投資
contentSnippet: 資産運用大手ティー・ロウ・プライスは、仮想通貨ETFの申請書を米SECに提出。投資対象にはビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど時価総額が高い銘柄が含まれる。

title: BTCマイニング株、ビットコイン価格と連動せずAI事業シフトで上昇＝JPモルガンレポート
contentSnippet: JPモルガンの最新レポートによると、上場ビットコインマイニング企業の株価は仮想通貨価格との相関関係が崩れ、AI事業への転換により独自の動きを見せている。

title: ビットコイン需要が枯渇、不安定な局面続くか＝Glassnode分析
contentSnippet: Glassnodeが仮想通貨ビットコイン市場の最新レポートを分析。需要枯渇や長期保有者の売却増加から、市場の不安定な局面が続く可能性を指摘している。

title: トランプ大統領、CZ氏の恩赦について発言
contentSnippet: トランプ大統領はバイナンス創業者のCZ氏への恩赦について「彼がやったことは犯罪ですらなかった」とコメント。多くの善良な人々の要請を受けて恩赦を与えたと明かした。

title: ポリマーケットが最大2兆円の評価額で資金調達検討、わずか4カ月で10倍に
contentSnippet: 米賭けサイトプラットフォームのポリマーケットは120億ドルから150億ドルの評価額で資金調達を目指す。6月の評価額10億ドルからわずか4カ月で10倍以上急上昇。

title: ソラナDEXジュピター、予測市場のベータ版をローンチ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ソラナのブロックチェーン上のDEXアグリゲーターJupiterは、予測市場のベータ版をローンチ。予測市場プラットフォームKalshiの流動性を活用している。

title: RAND Warns of AI-Driven Cyber Chaos in New ‘Robot Insurgency’ Report
contentSnippet: RAND Corporation's simulation has shed light on how a rogue AI could cripple U.S. infrastructure before humans could react.

title: Wallets Tied to Melania Trump Meme Coin Airdropped $1.2 Million in Meteora Tokens
contentSnippet: Meteora’s co-founder resigned from his leadership role due to his part in the MELANIA launch. Now wallets linked to it just received an airdrop of $1.2 million in MET.

title: BNB, World Liberty, Meme Coins Jump After Trump Pardons Binance Founder
contentSnippet: Coins and tokens linked to crypto mogul Changpeng Zhao and President Trump jumped in price following news of the latest pardon.

title: OpenAI's ChatGPT Atlas Browser Has a Big Problem—How Crypto Users Can Protect Themselves
contentSnippet: OpenAI's AI web browser faces prompt injection attacks that security experts call an unsolved problem—but there are some things you can do to be safe.

title: Alleged 'Trump Insider Whale' Closes $200 Million Bitcoin Short
contentSnippet: A wallet alleged to have connections to President Trump's family closed a major Bitcoin short ahead of Thursday's price jump.

title: Benchmark Boosts Bitcoin Miner Maker Canaan's Stock Target, Praising 'Turnaround Story'
contentSnippet: The firm's stock rose Thursday, and has traded solidly above $1 during October.

title: Canada Hits Crypto Firm With $126 Million Fine
contentSnippet: Cryptomus has been fined $126 million for failing to report thousands of high-risk transactions tied to child abuse, ransomware, and Iran-linked transfers.

title: Bitcoin Climbs to $111K as Whipsaw Action in Crypto Continues
contentSnippet: The trend has most definitely not been your friend this week as dips get bought and rallies get sold.

title: Institutions Drive CME Crypto Options to $9B as ETH, SOL, XRP Set Records
contentSnippet: Open interest across CME’s regulated markets jumped 27% since Oct. 10, signaling growing conviction among large traders.

title: The Crypto Industry Must Evolve to Match Real-World Security Risks
contentSnippet: Security issues like data breaches and phishing attacks are a type of feedback for Web3 designers, argues Tools for Humanity’s Adrian Ludwig.

title: Swiss Crypto Bank AMINA Taps Tokeny to Build Compliant 'Bridge' for Asset Tokenization
contentSnippet: The partnership combines AMINA Bank’s Swiss-regulated custody with Tokeny’s blockchain infrastructure to ease tokenisation for financial institutions.
